title: Spiral Wars
story_summary: In Stenograd, where a silent, all-seeing system scores every citizen and shapes daily life, chaos erupts after the mysterious death of Marek Halden, the architect of the city's Behavioral Compliance Index. As automated governance falters, power-hungry councils covertly weaponize Halden's secret override protocols, sabotaging rival BCI systems to gain advantage. Essential services unravel, triggering widespread mistrust and angry street protests. Sensing disaster, Oksana Lintz and Nikola Petrak unite feuding leaders, forging a tense truce that halts sabotage and restores order, giving hope that cooperation might save their fractured city.

official.headline: Service Access Updates
official.anchor_line: BCI adjustments cause brief pauses in access to select city services this week.
official.contextual_reframing: System maintenance ensures reliable performance. Residents are advised to follow standard guidance for uninterrupted service.

official.headline: Citizen Engagement Grows
official.anchor_line: Public gatherings observed as citizens express support for transparent system recalibration.
official.contextual_reframing: Community feedback is key to system optimization. Coordinated public responses demonstrate societal unity.

official.headline: Unified Path Forward
official.anchor_line: A citywide truce is reached. Councils agree to restore key services and transparent BCI management.
official.contextual_reframing: Collaborative leadership prevails. The system adapts and strengthens with renewed public trust.

underground.headline: System Crashes Spread
underground.anchor_line: Service failures hit homes and clinics as sabotage spikes BCI chaos.
underground.contextual_reframing: Your clean access points are breaking. This isn't a 'glitch' - councils are fighting each other and we pay the price.

underground.headline: Protests In The Streets
underground.anchor_line: Confused, furious, and locked out - people finally protest the system that governs their lives.
underground.contextual_reframing: They say adjustment is smooth. Truth: neighborhoods erupt as trust in the Council algorithm collapses. Stand together or risk getting ghosted.

underground.headline: Truce Or Surrender?
underground.anchor_line: Council elites call a fragile truce after mutual sabotage nearly starves the city.
underground.contextual_reframing: Restored services aren't mercy. The only reason for this 'unity' is public outrage. Stay alert - next time, the overrides might not stop in time.
